here's how to check: sudo dd if=/dev/hda bs=512 count=1 | od -c
yup - & you should see "GRUB" or "LILO" in there depending
here's how to check: sudo dd if=/dev/sda bs=512 count=1 | od -c
makes it easier to launch a terminal if you add it to the gnome task bar - right click -> add applet -> application launcher -> accessories -> terminal
here's how to check: sudo dd if=/dev/sda bs=512 count=1 | od -c |grep -i grub
do you see grub mentioned in 'the load of shite' ?
if you see "G R U B" mentioned there, then that's your boot loader, I think LILO will also have its name in there somewhere
